entities.description: Whether the respondent used prescription fentanyl in the past 12 months.
Fentanyl that is illegally made and cannot be obtained from a doctor or pharmacy.
Whether the respondent has ever used illegally made fentanyl.
Whether the respondent has ever injected illegally made fentanyl using a needle.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their usage of prescription fentanyl in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used illegally made fentanyl.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever injected illegally made fentanyl with a needle.
